title: Lotte Mensink
text:
Hi there!
I’m Lotte. I am a Methodology and Statistics student at Utrecht University. I am currently writing my thesis, and soon I will be graduated. Besides studying, I teach statistics to Bachelor students, which is something I really like to do. Within the field of statistics, my interests are broad. These are some topics that I find particularly interesting:
Structural Equation Modelling
Causal Inference
Administrative Data in Official Statistics

title: Projects
text:
Currently, I am writing my thesis about efficient audit sample selection. The goal is to develop a procedure that selects audit samples that are representative, but also efficient in terms of the effort that is needed to evaluate such a sample. Eventually, we aim to summarize the results of the study in a practical guideline for researchers.
If you would like a more detailed overview of the project, feel free to read my research report, that provides an introduction to the method and an overview of the current state of the project.
